title: Viewed Product with Variant Info
description: Instead of the standard Shopify Viewed Product snippet, this snippet can be used to also capture variant information for the currently viewed variant and will re-trigger whenever a new variant is selected. The selector ".product-form" must be updated to the form in which variant options are selectable in your Shopify store on a product.liquid page (in this example, the form has a the attribute class="product-form"). If you are implementing this via GTM, you must also remove the "Categories" property since it requires liquid tags to render, a new property called "Tags" is also included as a fallback should this be the case and you still want to filter based on some categorization for the product.
